items.sentence: You don't have to worry about picking me up at the airport. I'll take the bus.
Tom's red-headed wife wondered why there was a long blonde hair on his jacket.
The future is not looking bright from the perspective of many people under 30.
As for me, I'm not satisfied with the result of the examination the other day.
I was born in Boston but moved to Chicago with my parents when I was thirteen.
The long drought followed by weeks of rain caused some of Tom's crops to fail.
In all my travels, I've never seen a more beautiful mountain than Mt. Everest.
I'll leave a key with my next-door neighbour in case you get here before I do.
I'm sorry, but I can't accept your invitation. I have other plans on that day.
I regret to say that the product you have asked for is currently out of stock.
